players.name: Alice
memory: You: " I'm shocked by Diana's death and want to know more about what happened last night."
Charlie: "I think we should investigate Bob further, as they were the last one to see Diana alive."
Bob: "I'm innocent, I swear. I didn't kill Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
